events.message: The applicant has completed and submitted the mortgage application for the purchase of a new home.
The submitted application has been categorised and identified under mortgage loan processing for a residential property.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to the mortgage application to assist the applicant through the process.
The loan officer completed an initial review of the applicant's submitted mortgage documents and financial details.
Additional documents including property appraisal and proof of income were requested from the applicant to proceed.
The applicant has successfully submitted the requested property appraisal report and updated income statements.
A full credit check was conducted showing a stable credit score suitable for mortgage loan approval consideration.
Risk assessment was completed indicating average risk based on applicant’s financial history and property value.
A mortgage loan offer including interest rates and repayment plans has been presented to the applicant for review.
The applicant provided positive feedback and requested minor adjustments to the repayment schedule.
The application was escalated to senior underwriting due to requested repayment plan modifications by the applicant.
The mortgage loan application was formally approved after senior underwriting review and final risk evaluation.
The approved mortgage funds have been successfully transferred to the applicant’s escrow account for home purchase.
A follow-up was conducted with the applicant to confirm the receipt of funds and satisfaction with the loan process.
The mortgage loan application file has been closed successfully after confirming all procedures and documentation.
